title: Prepare Audit Committee Materials
description: The Chief Audit Executive (CAE) prepares materials for the quarterly Audit Committee meeting.

tasks.description: Summarize all audit reports issued during the quarter.
tasks.expected_outcome: A concise summary of recent audit activity is created.

tasks.description: Create a dashboard showing the status of all open audit findings, highlighting any that are past their remediation due date.
tasks.expected_outcome: A clear visual dashboard on remediation status is generated.

tasks.description: Compile the materials into a formal presentation deck for the Audit Committee.
tasks.expected_outcome: A professional presentation is ready for the board-level meeting.
